mapper.select: select seq, discount_rate, balloon_number from shop
select user_id, balloon from user where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into coupon(user_id, expired_period, discount_rate) values(#{user_id}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), ${discount_rate})
mapper.update: update user set balloon = (balloon-(select balloon_number from shop where seq=${seq})) where user_id=#{id}
